org.jumprobotics.robot.math

Class RigidTransform2

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jumprobotics.robot.math.RigidTransform2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Interpolable<RigidTransform2>

    public final class RigidTransform2
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Interpolable<RigidTransform2>
    A rigid transform is a type of transformation that represents both a translation and a rotation.
    Since:
    0.2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
